Blog.post: Haha...soo..waddup? my few days haf been specatular..went to dani's hse...went out wif dani...so perfect..neways..2day dani gave me..weell..askked me 2 take care of her dear gollum and frodo( her beaitufl turtle and fish) soo..it is so funky..and nice.. neways ah..shes leavin on monday..and im gonna be so busy..gonna be goin for..a new computer course... neways...juz checkin if this thing worked..it had some problem some time ago..so yeah neways gonna...juz..drink now soo...i love you baby!! love u my angel love u dani!! by3by3

Yep...those trance kinda state like music..the ones dat make you think? so cool..i like those kinda songs...lyk umm..sing for absolution..so beautiful..makes you wanna cry..haha..so niiice.. newaysa im so bored now..its..umm..1.22am..and juz..chattin wif sonia..shes d only one online other den the ppl with their status away and actually replying. neways my dani is goin holiday!!! AAAAAAAAHHH juz wat i need now...im soo gonna miss her...damn i want her all over me..hehe..shes so...sex appealing..the way..she moves...the body language! AH ITS SCREAMING..' HAVE ME U SEXY HOTTY' damn baby i got ya...:P neways she goin to thailand and umm..langkkawai...(richrich) wile she has so much fun..her sad bf wil be at home..eatin icecream and...makin myself..eat wif depression neways donnu lar byeby3!! love you my baby dani!! kiss kiss love love

ahhh..the past few days have been really funky...yesterday.. went to dani's hse and had so much fun..ah..i love her so much!!watched titanic..ate sum..nuggets n..umm chips..den..got to the pretty emotional part.. . ahh...dani got abit...uhmm..red cheeeked!! hehe...ah..still so beautiful.. neways after tat..went to..swimmin pool..amd my god the swimmin pool was freezin..u cud see ppl juz frozen n stuff..so we went n got some boilin water to make our little spot and swim there..it was funky of course...we started playin throw the leaf that had fallen into the swimmin pool at each other..den i put my leaf on onena my titties and dani suddenly didnt recognise me..weird innit? but wen i took it off it was lyk..hey! presto shes back..haha neways 2day..is abit boring..went church..came bak..slept..umm..went to a lil dim sum place( no really thats the name) and den..umm went 2 find my mp3 playa! haha..den umm..i 4got to go for my footie traini 2day..errgh!! I SO WANTED TO GO...but..oh well..neways..pretty bored now..woz playin cs and i came out 2nd..lyk...21kills n 3 deaths..pretty rad...but dis other guy got 24 kills n 5 deaths..aah..juz a lil.. neways im watchin star travelasia abt thailand.. neways thats it i guess..hehe...WRITE TO U LATER.. bybebye love u dani!!

ah..today was a day of..mixed feelings.. 2day is d last day my cuzzies r here..they leavin early mornin 2moro..went out to megamall today..ate at..umm..the food junction..only had a..carrot cake thingy..it woz..nice..mostly egg.. neways.. after that..went to cybercafe where i COMPLETELY and TOTALLY kicked ass..i swear..ppl were wonderin hu i was..they were lyked..shoutin..HU IS NIKKED?hehe..dint wanna tell em..coz they mite come 2 my seat and kill me..i killed so many ppl..hehe..OWNED n ruleD. neways after that..we went home..umm..nufin heppened..but after dat..went dinner..then discovered dat the restaurant was closed..soo..went to another place n had really good food.. neways went home..but by then..for summa reason..had a massive stomach ache and i rushed 2 d toilet and crapped it all out..lyk..all out..ahh..cudnt wait..juz kept pushin...ahh..wen it was all over..i felt so good..i was like... LET it BE OVER!...in mah head..and so..shat out summore stuff den i was so happy..got all d crap out.. neways after dat played cs agen..nufin else but on the other hand..well..i feel sumfin goin on wif my relationship wif dani.. but but but.. i love her so much..to the bone..to the..white blood cells..gave her a promise ring..and i wanna keep it dat way!! i wanna marry her and hav kids n..live forever together..i love her so much so dani..if ur readin dis..i love you my sweetness..i love you so much.. gdnite!! love love you dani..my beautiful hot babe.. byebye

Well.. then..nothing happened today..my cousins from australia came back from a short hol in brunei..so..they're stayin for..2 days..n den goin bak down under.. neways i feel..kinda..low today..bored i guess...i dont really feel..normal i guess..hehe..my gf didnt feel..normal..i think..she was neutral..i love her so much..sometimes i wonder if ..umm.. neways.. played cs all day....ah..rite now..im jus looking blankly at the screen..wondering what to write..my finger is..shaking..too much..computer typing today..i guess..im feeling..so..sad for some kind of reason..like..down..ah..i wish my life was as perfect as my gfs sometimes..or like other ppls..got so many problems....well..i dont discuss dem with any1 actually..hehe..only wif dis bloggin thinger.. neways im listnin 2 music now..umm...greenday-warning..hehe..but..its kinda a happy song..lol..now its eskobar..aah..how i love rock slow song kinda music..like them..love strikes..beautiful neways....................................... uhmm..i dont noe...dani told me its impossible to get a 4pac by..umm 4 weeks..i guess..she said not to lose hope though...well..obviously i gonna try! i cant waste my buxx on richa agen..shes stolen so much from me alredY(and btw..she owes me 15bux.)ill show them..i WILL get at least a 2 pack...great..now this stuupid download of mine has fuking failed... neways what is life? According to the great searches by google..its a magazine..real life comics..business..ah..well thats everything but life..Life is..what you do in your life..Your life..your..being..for me..its jus to..live each day..go to school..come back..watch my fish..take care of my gf..actually..my whole life revolves around her...i cant do nethin without her being part of it..(ok maybe shitting n..other..funky stuff) but..i dont noe..i just love her so much..i begin to..get paranoid..i guess..haha..like..other boys..'liking her' and..yeah..i dont think i can control her to avoid boys i guess...i have to trust her..well i do..im jus so..paranoid..all this because of dreams..imagine..dreams can change lives..dreams can inspire..or can backfire..oh well..i guess dreams happen to every life..once..i was on d fone..wif sum1 ..and my friend rellay had to go..but i juz kept on yappin..so..he put down d fone on me..wen i woz gonna say sumfin..so..it woz kinda like a shock..hehe..oh well.. neways ull probably be thinkin wat dis mambo jumbo is..well..its just..thoughts from..my head..wondering..this is d only place dat i trust will keep it safe from the depths of my parents n sister searchin my room for ne signs of 'diary keeping'.. neways... i juz woke up..and now i wanna get bak 2 sleep.. (btw if ur wonderin..i juz had dis dream..which ..was freaky..so i personally..(obviously) switched on my computer..and started writing..neways then..bybey!) love u dani!

i had this dream that..was so..convincing..and..scary..that in d morning..juz had 2 wake up n do it.. neways i aint sucidal or anything!!!hehe...juz wrote wat i felt AT THAT MOMENT..but thankx neways love..ur d greatest....soo..2day was pretty boring..watched total disney and nick..becoz of my lil cousins..aah..nothin else 2 write i guess!! sorry so short..hope 2moro will be better im sure..afta my cuzzies from aussie leave..im goin ta gym..and hopefully get something outta it.. neways love ya dani@!!! miss u loads..

So..nuthin actually gotta do with the title..jus..lame me.. well..NEWAYS.. well ok fine its gotta do sumting..my good friend..has sum friends..from sume place and wen i..kinda got to..do stuff..my good friend got pissed coz i told her dat her friend is nice..n bla bla bla..well..ive learned a lesson..geeky friends r cool too..even if dey dont haf the power to charm..or maybe..the power of..flying..they still are good friends..and i respect dat..so ive learnt a lesson..but sometimes i think they r too harsh with me..but NEWAYS juz finished chattin wif my gurl...shes bored..she didnt do nefin 2day..juz sat around and umm..sat around..2day was day one of my schlieffen plan.. to get richas 25 bux. I am trying to invade the ab barrier and get a 4pac..but if i get a 4pac..i also need to get some nice arms..and nice legs..so..2day..went for running in d mornin..at ..7am..got tired wen i woz back..had a nice bath..den..played cs like an idiot.(although i rule at it thank u kok wye..) till abt..3.09..den my driver came and sent me to the club...den i went inside 2 d gym and started..1st i went for the obvious..the ab machine..did 150 of ups and downs..i cud alredy feel my abs forming...the power..den i went to the dumbells and took a ..relatively .abit less den heavy weight n did around..90 altogether..so.180 on both arms..after dat..my muscles were bulgin lyk crazy..ehhe..soo..after dat..wen to another...machine..for the arms..u put ur arms around these holder and push ur hands to meet in the middle...it woz..hard..im a hand weakling..soo..did aroun 65..it woz ok..den..went runnin on d treadmachine for abt..10 minutes..had 2 go..so i had 2 plan my time..den..i had 10 minutes left spare..so i did all of em agen..did a few pushups and..left..wiped myself down wif a towel..left d place..had 2 wait for my driver..den we travelled..i slept on d way home...woz KINDA drooling..not really..but..yeah..driver woke me up we i reached home..soo..yeah.. neways after dat..i came home..ate stuff..drank loadsa water..den went bak 2 d ol faithful computer and play cs agen..den i chatted 2 danielle den im now typing dis thing neways i wuld like to write a short poem..on....wad i am feelin rite now so here it goes.. please laugh if u wish to The times go by the months flow like water; july is here i look at the sky friends have come and gone..many do cry but as a new time dawns jus like a newborn fawn takin its first steps i wonder what cards will be dealt to determine my future would it be a whole new adventure? or just another life in the day of a teenager who is under the labour of love (to danielle my sweetheart) if it sucks..plz tell me..ne1 who reads dis..coz den ill juz go get real poetry n put it as the poem of d day..hehe) well den..gdnite danielle my love.. gdnite malaysia.. by3by3!

oh well..today was ..a kinda funky day..went 2 church..went up for this...all so mighty rite of callin thing..no idea..wat it is..oh well..after that i went to my cousins house..and played a computa game..postmaster 2 or sumthin..a beautiful 1st person shooter VIOLENT game..ooh how i love killing..well ( NOT REALLY...just computa)and ww1 and 2 games..ooh..the blood...the sounds of machine guns and mortar fallin on helpless foes of war.. NEWAYS after dat..we played ps2...umm..winning eleven euro 2004 edition..and..we were playin together..pretty cool..d 1st 3 games..were like..totally zonked..all draws and had 2 be decided on penals..(hehe sounds like penis..)okok..fine..but newyas..i won d 1st 2..and he won the 3rd one..but after that..we chose radical teams and..my passing was far superior to his..he was more skills..and..cool tricks..i jus passed and crossed..soo..but ok..1 game..i was like..loosing 2-0..and it was d 2nd half..soo..suddenly..he pulled his goalie out..and i took a shot..and scored! wahoo! and den..a BEAUTY of a goal...took a few shots but all got deflected..so..den..my player..facing away from goal..passed to a midfielder who crossed it to the back of the defence and was caught without ne defenders..so i had a free header which i smashed to the side of the goal...ah..the sound of the cheerin crowds.. den..the last one was..ok i guess..passed around..did some..slow dribling..got pass d defenders and 1-1 wit d goalie..passed to my mate on d other side of moi and scored..and voila.. i won! it woz d last kick of d game.. but NEWAYS.. played few more games including manu vs manu in SAME kits..and arsenal vs arsenal in same kits too..so confuzing..din haf a clue who we were passin to..and someitimes woz gonna score on goal..but i discovered dat wen i woz abt to shoot..my player wud suddenly turn around an..shoot..d other side.. NEWAYS.. after dat i had football training at rsc..and..dat woz cool i guess..but i played the worst ever football i have ever played in my life..it was..totally horrendous.. i mean..i had dis amazing oppurtininty 2 score..and it sailed over the bar..so gracefully and disgracefully.. umm..yea..NEWAYS went home..ate..and currently typed dis long thing out..chatted to my one sweet love and she is d best..sexxiest and..totally..d best gf id ever had..damn i wish i culd do sumthin naughty 2 her :P:P hehe..well..yeah..wud be pretty funky..ahhaha.. neways.. my back hurts..and umm..legs are totally dead..so.. love u dani! gdnite..sweet dreams love u blogger.. thanks ben for bein cool wif lettin me copy ur idea of makin a blog so other cppl can read it! and umm..gdnite..every1 else..to whom i have not mentioned .. by3by3!

. Aah...the smell of home entered my nostrils as i stepped into my room.. The smell of the fishtank.. the smell of the clothes..which .. i keep..and the smell of that oh so irratating ....under..wear..boxers..which have been hiding under my bed..for oh so long.. neways.. dani's parents were the GREATEST. i mean i've met them so many many times but umm..dis is the 1st time my parents haf gone out 2gether..as lyk..umm dinner..well..they haf bin 2 my barbq..n stuff..but..this. was the beginning. neways after a scrumptious dinner...we went bak to her hse..which by the way..is lavishly furnished with the ..best..furniture ive seen in my life..(maybe its becoz ive..only seen..hses which suck) but..still..had a BEAUTIFUL bar..aah neways.. im watchin pool now..umm..a swede and..the taiwanese.. pretty cool..chang..leadin 10 racks to 7..after he woz loosing...lyk umm.6-2 or sumthin..haha. ah..soo..howz life every1 else?? me is the best ever..im so in love with the girl i wanna marry.. well..i wanna marry her..shes so hot..and beautiful..and kind.. (and shes got big tushies:P) naw..kiddin(but its true..) but stil..i love her..and..wanna be with her forever.. nEWAYS.. im gettin sleepy by all the typing of dis..and btw its 1.12am..so im pretty bummed out,.. love ya dani! love..u..? i guess ..(to the blogger) by3by3!

yoyo..wassup..my 1st..blog thingy.. saw bens one on msn..pretty funky..nice pics n stuff.. neways start of d ol holidayz..umm..gonna be pretty cool..taking on a bet with richa dat i get at least a defined 4 pac by the new term..soo..im hoping my mum wont suffer from trafficjam symdrome and..get me 2 d club ..to..get some..pacs.. neways 2day is the day me and danielles parents..go out for a ..dinner together..jeez i cant wait..this is the start..of something beautiful..ahh..oh how i love her..the smell..umm..her...juz everything about her..and now..its goin a step further,..damn.. i hope i dont mess up and make a complete shittery out of myself.. neways. im watchin..umm..rugrats for some reason..actually..jus listening to it.. kinda.. now..its something about tommy and..umm..the rollercoaster..haha..ok that is so lame.. ANYWAYS its 7.12pm..and our thingy is at 8..gotta meet her parents..(well ive already met them at..many times before..use 2 go 2 her house every friday..) but umm.. my parents..have met a couple of times..when..we had a barbq..and..wen my family brough..dani to..redang..which was THE BEST..gawd..so good.. neways.. ive gotta go now..wear something hot..and..nice..uhmm..wad shal i wear? what perfum shall i put on?...damn..my pits smell..gotta get sum deo.. so ..then.. by3by3! nikked
